name: QWASushi v1
description:
A once inanimate sushi roll, cast into the depths of a nuclear reactor. The immense dosage of radiation causing spontaneous sentience of the sushi roll. With their newfound intelligence they only have one thing on their mind,

soy sauce

Game Controls:

  • Use QWAS to lift each corner of the sushi
  • Press the QWAS keys one after another in order to roll the sushi.
  • Press M to open the Menu for Restarting Levels, Fullscreen, Next and Previous Level.
  • R Press R to respawn at the last collected soy sauce.
